basement.name: Basement
basement.description: You wake up on the floor in a dark place. You feel disoriented and cannot recall how you got here. As you look around, you see a few rays light filtering through an opening.

morgue.name: Morgue
morgue.description: The room is pitch dark, except for a ray of light that filters through some opening. It is difficult to tell where the light is coming from, but it allows you to see outlines of shapes.

emergencyRoom.name: Emergency Room
emergencyRoom.description: You enter the emergency room. Everything is mostly stripped away besides a couple of supplies on the floor.

office.name: Office
office.description: A supervisor's office, off to the right you notice a desk with items of interest.

frontDesk.name: Front Desk
frontDesk.description: Entrance and Exit this way, but its locked...

hallway.name: Hallway
hallway.description: You are in a hallway, there are several doors, one that is locked, however you notice that one of the doors is different. This door has a mechanical keypad; you need a combination in order to open this door.

patientRoom.name: Patient Room
patientRoom.description: You enter a medium size room, it contains a bed, some health monitoring equipment and a side table.
